name: safe-rust
description: Safety-critical Rust development with 9-layer Swiss Cheese verification model. Features upfront design review, automated gate validation, and iterative refinement loops.
longDescription: A comprehensive Claude Code plugin for developing safety-critical Rust applications. Implements the Swiss Cheese model with 9 verification layers: Requirements, Architecture, TDD, Implementation, Static Analysis, Formal Verification, Dynamic Analysis, Independent Review, and Safety Case. Supports ISO 26262 (ASIL), IEC 61508 (SIL), and DO-178C (DAL) safety standards.
